definitions.definition: A person who obtains things by force; a thug or bully.
definitions.example: They were doing fine until they encountered a bunch of toughs from the opposition.
The tent, made of tough canvas, held up to many abuses.

definitions.definition: (of food) Difficult to cut or chew.
definitions.example: To soften a tough cut of meat, the recipe suggested simmering it for hours.
Only a tough species will survive in the desert.
He had a reputation as a tough negotiator.
A bunch of the tough boys from the wrong side of the tracks threatened him.

definitions.definition: Used to indicate lack of sympathy
definitions.example: If you don't like it, tough!
